title: Research Scenario set Unit 1 - experimental groups

content.question: Why is it necessary in this study to have at least one experimental condition and one control condition?

choices.label: Without the experimental condition, there would not be enough participants in the study.
It is necessary to determine if the placebo effect played a role in the outcome of the study.
The control condition provides a comparison to the experimental condition.
The inclusion of an experimental condition eliminates the possibility of confounding variables.

content.answer: The control condition provides a comparison to the experimental condition.

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
